name: Tetri
description:
Small experimentation of a minimalist 3d puzzle game with 14 levels.
The game is not really polished or anything but I was tired of working on it, so here it is.

The sound is more of a placeholder than anything, don't put the volume to high :D

If you encounter weird bugs in the browser, I invite you to try the .exe version of the game.

Tutorial

  • Enter: let the piece move to his hinted position
  • Arrows keys: turn the active anchor
  • Space: switch to an other active anchor
  • Backspace: retry the current puzzle

You have a finite number of move for each level, if they are all used you lose and need to retry. The less move you use to resolve a puzzle, the best score you get.

When arriving on the last recap panel with the total score you can click on a level to try it again, once win you can do next to go back to that panel.

Thanks for playing! Try to bit my score ;)
